articles.title: Eczema: How sun exposure during vacation can affect your skin microbiome - Medical News Today
articles.description: Researchers say sun exposure during vacation can lead to changes in the skin microbiome, although those effects tend to fade once a person returns home
articles.content:
• Researchers investigated how sun-seeking behavior by people on vacation affects the skin microbiome.
